casebody.data:
FARM BUREAU
v.
ARMWOOD, et al. No. 99A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 23, 2007. R. Michael Strickland, Glenn C. Raynor, Raleigh, for N.C. Farm Bureau. Frank A. Cassiano, Jr., Greenville, John Bramble, Charles David Creech, New Bern, for Armwood, et al. James W. Bryan, Daniel W. Koenig, Greensboro, for Trucking Industry Defense Asso. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of April 2007 by Amici for Extension of Time to File Amici Curiae Brief: "Motion Allowed. Amici (PCI and AIA) shall have up to and including the 23rd day of April 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of April 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
